parameters.query:
WITH v AS (
  SELECT
    NULLIF('{{ String($json.realm ?? "default").replace(/'/g, "''") }}','') AS realm_key,
    GREATEST(0, COALESCE(NULLIF('{{ String($json.max_rows ?? 500) }}',''), '500')::int) AS max_rows
)
SELECT
  v.realm_key AS realm,
  v.max_rows,
  itsm.apply_retention_batch(itsm.set_rls_context(v.realm_key), true, v.max_rows) AS summary
FROM v;
